title: Bournemouth: Ask your pre-season questions
title_page: Bournemouth: Ask your pre-season questions - BBC Sport
maintext:
The 2023-24 Premier League season is edging ever nearer, so what shape are Bournemouth in before the big kick-off on Saturday, 12 August?
We'll put a selection of your questions on all things Cherries to our local radio expert for their insider take - so ask whatever you'd like to know.
